::: text-center
PyRUU is a website created by lecturers at Utrecht University to teach data science in both R and Python to anyone wishing to learn these programming languages for exploring, visualising, and analysing real-world data.

This website also contains freely accessible content specific to courses for students at Utrecht University.

The development of this website is supported by the Faculty of Geosciences of Utrecht University.
:::
